name: TuyaSmartSocketChannelKit
prefix_header_contents:
#ifdef __OBJC__
  // #import <TuyaSmartBaseKit/TuyaSmartBaseKit.h>
  #import <TuyaSmartUtil/TuyaSmartUtil.h>

  #undef TYLog
  #undef TYSDKLogDebug
  #undef TYSDKLogInfo
  #undef TYSDKLogWarn
  #undef TYSDKLogError
  #define TYSDKLogDebug(...)         TYSDKLog(0, @"TuyaSmartSocketChannelKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define TYSDKLogInfo(...)         TYSDKLog(1, @"TuyaSmartSocketChannelKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define TYSDKLogWarn(...)         TYSDKLog(2, @"TuyaSmartSocketChannelKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define TYSDKLogError(...)         TYSDKLog(3, @"TuyaSmartSocketChannelKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)

  #import "TuyaSmartSocketChannelKit.h"
#endif
